author: Bahá'u'lláh
source_text:
(١٤) ﴿ ای دوستان ﴾
بجمال فانی از جمال باقی مگذريد و بخاکدان ترابی دل مبنديد *
translation:
(14) O FRIENDS!
Abandon not the everlasting beauty for a beauty that must die, and set not your affections on this mortal world of dust.

terms.literal: to carve; to hew; to shape; dust of carving
terms.note: Sole occurrence in corpus as 'mortal world of dust.' SE expands the Arabic root t-r-sh (dust of carving) into a fuller theological phrase, elevating material temporality.
